name: Stackable Gems
description: Adds another variation of gems that can stack together. Transmute a gem in the Cube to convert it between the two variants. Based on https://www.nexusmods.com/diablo2resurrected/mods/80.
author: olegbl

config.name: Default to Stackable
config.description: Enable to have the stackable variant be the default (e.g. items will drop as stackable).

config.name: Maximum Stack Size
config.description: The maximum quantity that each stack can have.

config.name: Convert When Destacking
config.description: Enable to have the split off gem automatically convert to a non-stackable variant when splitting a stack. Warning: this adds 15k+ cube recipes which slows down the game's startup.

config.name: Bulk Upgrade Recipe
config.description: Enable to add 30 to 10 bulk upgrade recipes (stack of 30 gems + 1 id scroll = stack of 10 gems of the next highest tier). Warning: this adds 6k+ cube recipes which slows down the game's startup.
